Wutan Bath

Control, discipline, flexibility, balance

Classes

This page is updated on a regular basis - keep checking back to see what’s new. Please note that in addition to per session costs there is an annual £20 membership of Wutan as a whole which also covers insurance.

Monday

19:00 - 20:00 - Tai Chi

Instructor: Marick Baxter - 07881 646 633

Location: Central United Reformed Church, Frome Road
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing Qigong, Ba Gua, Hsing I, weapon forms and the Yang-style short Tai Chi form. All levels of experience are welcome.

Price per session: £7

20:30 - 22:00 - Kung Fu

Instructor: Marick Baxter - 07881 646 633

Location: Central United Reformed Church, Frome Road
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing Wing Chun Preying Mantis style, Chai Lei Fut and Chinese Kickboxing. All levels of experience are welcome.

Price per session: £7

Tuesday

17:00 - 18:30 - Children and Youths Kung Fu

Instructor: Marick Baxter - 07881 646 633

Location: Central United Reformed Church, Frome Road
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing Wing Chun Preying Mantis style, Chai Lei Fut and Chinese Kickboxing tailored to the younger generations. All levels of experience are welcome.

Price per session: £7

18:30 - 20:00 - Five Animals Kung Fu

Instructor: Marick Baxter - 07881 646 633

Location: Central United Reformed Church, Frome Road
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing the Five Animal styles of Kung Fu. All levels of experience are welcome.

Price per session: £7

Wednesday

11:00 - 12:00 - Seated Tai Chi

Instructor: Jim Litster - 01225 427 461

Location: Weston Parish Hall, Church Street
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing a seated form of Tai Chi.

Price per session: £TBD

19:30 - 21:15 - Seated Tai Chi

Instructor: David Rutherford - 07970 797 482

Location: Hayesfield Lower School, Brougham Hayes
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing Qigong followed by miscellaneous training (Bagua, sensing hands etc.) and finishing with the Yang-style short form. All levels of experience are welcome, but please contact David to check for specific beginner sessions.

Price per session: £8

Thursday

19:30 - 21:00 - Kung Fu

Instructor: Marick Baxter - 07881 646 633

Location: Nexus Methodist Church, Eastbourne Avenue
Google Maps link

This is an ongoing class practicing Wing Chun Preying Mantis style, Chai Lei Fut and Chinese Kickboxing. All levels of experience are welcome.

Price per session: £7
